casebody.data:
Barker Place, as executor, &c., respondent, v. Jedediah K. Hayward, appellant. Decided June 1, 1885. Appeal from order of February 3, 1885, denying defendant’s motion to modify order of April 16, 1884.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Truax, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The order appealed from should be affirmed, with costs.
